tool_description: Manages error recovery strategies for failed scraping operations, including retry logic, fallback methods, and error classification.

error_type.description: Type of error encountered (network, parsing, validation, rate_limit, blocked)

retry_delay.description: Base delay between retries in seconds

exponential_backoff.description: Whether to use exponential backoff for retries

context_data.description: Additional context data for recovery decisions

error_messages: Invalid error type: Error type must be one of: network, parsing, validation, rate_limit, blocked
Invalid retry configuration: Max retries must be positive and attempt count must not exceed max retries
Recovery not possible: Error type is not recoverable or max retries exceeded
usage: Provide error details and current attempt information to get recovery recommendations and retry strategies. Configure retry behavior based on error tolerance requirements.

should_retry.description: Whether the operation should be retried
